Activates.description: Indicates when a component becomes active after being updated.

enumDescriptions.AfterDeviceReset: The update activates after a device reset.
enumDescriptions.AfterHardPowerCycle: The update activates after a full power supply disconnect or E-Fuse reset.
enumDescriptions.AfterReboot: The update activates after a host server reboot.

Configuration.description: string defining customized parameters for some components provided by client at upload time and given to the component at execution time (Type D only).

Created.description: ISO 8601 time string indicating when this component was added to the NAND.

Criticality.description: Indicates the criticality of the component.

DeviceClass.description: Device type GUID from iLO secure flash header

ExecutionParameters.description: Client supplied execution parameters.  These are supplied at upload time and given to the component at execution time (Type D only).

Filename.description: The unique filename of the component.

Filepath.description: Path of file on the USB LUN if you mount the repo as USB.

Locked.description: If true, this component cannot be removed with DELETE because it is referenced by an Install Set

SizeBytes.description: Size of the component file in bytes.

items.description: Target GUIDs from secure flash header or sidecar file.
Describes which types of update agents may apply this component.

enumDescriptions.Bmc: This component may be scheduled for update by iLO.
enumDescriptions.RuntimeAgent: This component may be scheduled for update by a runtime update agent such as Smart Update Manager or Smart Update Tool.
enumDescriptions.Uefi: This component may be scheduled for update by UEFI BIOS.

Version.description: Version of the component from secure flash header or sidecar file.
